question: How does solar affect the value of my home?
answer: Solar panels can increase the value of your home by up to 20% or more. Solar panels can also help you save on your energy bills, reducing your monthly expenses by up to 30%.

question: How much faster do solar friendly homes sell compared to non-solar homes?
answer: Solar friendly homes sell up to 30% faster than non-solar homes.

question: Will my home have power even if the sun is not shining?
answer: Yes! Solar panels are self-sufficient, meaning they can generate power even when the sun is not shining. This means your home can continue to function even if the sun is not shining.

question: Will my home operate any differently after installation?
answer: No, your home will not operate differently after installation. A dual meter is installed, meaning the electricity produced by the solar panels is split between the home and the grid. The meter measures the energy being produced and consumed, and the difference is sent to the electrical grid.
